glsa.title: sudo: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been found in sudo which may allow local users to gain escalated privileges.

background.p: sudo allows a system administrator to give users the ability to run commands as other users. Access to commands may also be granted on a range to hosts.

description.p: An error in sudo may allow unintended IPv4 hosts to be granted access to commands.

impact.p: A local attacker could gain escalated privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All sudo users should upgrade to the latest version:
